title: Stable One UI 4.1 update goes live for the Galaxy M31s
content:

The post Stable One UI 4.1 update goes live for the Galaxy M31s appeared first on XDA.
description: Samsung has started rolling out the stable One UI 4.1 update with Android 12 to the Galaxy M31s. Read on to know more.
